attributes.action: change the building regulations to ensure that new build houses are built with solar panels and rain water harvesting systems.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK's building regulations should be changed to ensure that all new houses are forced to include solar panels installed, which are linked to the national grid and rain water harvesting systems for the use of flushing toilets.

This would not only save the owners some money on electricity generated by the solar panels and the rainwater that is harvested, it would also help the environment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
